response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and value, I am confident it will exceed your expectations. Considering its worth to you, I propose a special offer of $13,500 for this product. This price reflects a fair compromise between its true value and your perceived valuation, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 13500}
